post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Job ID        4535
Company Name        Quest Software, Inc.
Job Category        Technology
Location        Toronto, Ontario
Position Type        Full-Time, Contract
Experience        5-10 Years Experience
Desired Education Level        Other
Date Posted        April 2, 2010 (Reposted Apr 3

ava UI Developer (12 month contract)
Quest Software, Inc. founded in 1987, with over 3,000 employees worldwide delivers innovative products that help organizations get more performance and productivity from their applications, databases and Windows infrastructure. Through a deep expertise in IT operations and a continued focus on what works best, Quest helps more than 18,000 customers’ worldwide meet higher expectations for enterprise IT. Quest Software can be found in offices around the globe and at www.quest.com.
Description:
We are currently looking for a Java UI Developer to contribute to our JProbe product offering.
The primary function will be to perform ongoing UI development for JProbe’s Swing and Eclipse SWT consoles. Secondary role is to develop, maintain and support Java based integration modules for 3rd party application servers.
Requirements:
• 5+ years experience developing software in a professional environment (Java, C++, OOP/OOD)
• Track record of delivering user interfaces using Java technologies: Swing, Eclipse, SWT
• Experience building solutions and diagnosing issues across various technology layers on Windows and UNIX systems.
• Experience building solutions for 3rd party Application Servers (WebLogic, WebSphere, JBoss etc.)
• Comfortable working on a wide range of technologies layers
• Strong work ethic and professionalism
Assets:
• The ability to trade off design and implementation alternatives based on project goals and risk assessment
• Experience with caching, memory management, threading, lock management, and I/O optimization
• Working experience with source revision control and build tools (SVN, Ant, Hudson )
• Experience working on a product development team
We offer a relaxed, yet professional work environment with a competitive salary and excellent benefits. We are an equal-opportunity employer and welcome all candidate applications who meet the requirements listed above.
post.title: Java UI developer -QUEST SOFTWARE
